Information.LongDescription: Hunters Glen is located in the planned community of the Villages of Marlborough, and exudes a certain small town charm. Historic Upper Marlboro, Maryland, provides a scenic backdrop. Northern Virginia and Washington, DC, are short commutes away, while historic Annapolis and the Chesapeake Bay are close by. You'll never run out of things to do at Hunters Glen. There's a fully equipped exercise room, as well as biking and jogging paths. There's even an 18-hole golf course next door. Come home to Hunters Glen and you'll find well-equipped kitchens, mini blinds and full-size washer dryer in every apartment. There are private balconies and patios, and some apartments have vaulted ceilings. A fireplace is optional as well. Garages are available for a monthly charge. No wonder Hunters Glen is the ideal location for those who want the best of everything.

At Spinnaker Bay, we've taken the time to perfect the balance of waterside tranquility and city excitement. There's a reason Harbor East has become Baltimore's most sought-after neighborhood. Featuring incredible new stores and restaurants, and just a short walk to Fells Point, the Inner Harbor and Downtown, Harbor East is the city's new urban center. Convenient to work and play, Spinnaker Bay offers the best location. In Harbor East, exciting shopping and sparkling water views combine to create one of Baltimore's most beautiful places to live. Information.ShortDescription: At The Metropolitan, you can expect nothing but the best in service, comfort, and convenience!
Information.LongDescription: The Metropolitan is Bethesda's premier luxury high rise community. Here, you can rest easy knowing there is 24 hour concierge and maintenance service backed by Bozzuto Management's service guarantee. Whether relaxing by our pristine rooftop pool and sundeck, keeping in shape at our 24 hour state of the art fitness center and free yoga classes, or enjoying a cup of complimentary gourmet coffee in our cyber cafe, we've got all your needs covered. Our spacious apartments are newly renovated and offer floor to ceiling windows, full size balconies, and breakfast bars. Add our other on-site conveniences such as dry cleaning, day care, and skywalk access to Safeway and you'll never want to leave! Of course, when you do decide to venture out we are walking distance to Bethesda's finest dining, shopping, and entertainment and only a half block from the Bethesda Metro on the red line. No matter what your style, The Metropolitan is the perfect place to call home.
Information.DrivingDirections: Located on the corner of Old Georgetown Road and Woodmont Avenue, directly next to the Bethesda Metro Center on the red line

Relax under a cabana with a good book or recharge with a Pilates class taught by our personal trainer in the Fitness Club followed by a dip in our indoor Olympic size pool. Recently remodeled with clean lines and a contemporary feel, this exclusive area for 1500 Locust Apartments' residents and their guests is the perfect setting to relax, recharge and enjoy. 1500 Locust offers studio, one and two bedroom homes with luxury kitchens featuring stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops in select units.

Information.ShortDescription: Dramatically close to the Capitol, the White House and the Smithsonian museums on the Mall, the Newseum Residences offer immediate access to the varied urban attractions and diversions of the exciting Penn Quarter neighborhood.
Information.LongDescription:
On historic Pennsylvania Avenue, halfway between the U.S. Capitol and the White House, stands the Newseum, an extraordinary structure that goes behind the scenes of the story of a free press, a cornerstone of our democracy.
In the same sleek and sophisticated building, across America's Main Street from the National Mall, is a select group of superlative urban living spaces: the Newseum Residences. These luxurious apartment homes offer unabridged access to the best of Washington-as well as stirring views of this city of landmarks. Enjoy prominence of place-in a place like no other.

Information.LongDescription:
Come to where the real Virginia begins and you'll understand why Manassas has become the new alternative to the hectic pace of today's suburban living. The lovely garden-style apartment homes of Rosemary Ridge are designed for people who value quiet time, family outings and above all, living well.
It's true Manassas has a lot of history. But that's not all you'll find here. Beyond the battlefield parks and the wealth of shopping venues, there's the quaint charm of Old Town Manassas, the center of an incredible variety of recreational and cultural attractions ranging from championship golf and auto racing to seasonal events and world class entertainment.
Truly, life in Manassas is far from ordinary. Yet living here means you're just as connected to the DC area as any suburbanite. From the historic Manassas Train Depot, the signature icon of Old Town, you can connect with the city and the world via a full schedule of daily Amtrak and Virginia Railway Express commuter trains.

Residents also enjoy access to a unique rooftop pool and terrace, a controlled-access multi-level parking garage with direct entry to all residential floors, a new 1800 sq. ft. state-of-the-art fitness center, and an elegant club room and library. Excalibur is conveniently located at 9050 Iron Horse Lane in scenic Pikesville Maryland, which is just minutes from both I-695 and I-795, as well as the numerous lifestyle amenities located along nearby Reisterstown Road.

Information.ShortDescription: The Halstead at Guilford offers a whole new world of features in a beautiful, old world setting. Among the century-old oaks, the quiet, sun-dappled thoroughfares and the seemingly endless rows of traditional and classic-style architecture is a place where people love to get together.
Information.LongDescription: In the midst of a magnificent neighborhood setting, we here at the Halstead at Guilford have created an unparalleled collection of comforts and amenities that will take your breath away. This deco-inspired community is a fusion of classic spaciousness and urban tranquility. A vibrant social scene. Apartments with large, spacious floorplans. And endless upscale community features. Welcome to The Halstead at Guilford, where you can truly have it all. Just a few short blocks from the historic campuses of Johns Hopkins and Loyola Universities, The Halstead at Guilford adds every modern comfort and convenience to an area rich in tradition. It's history in the re-making. We are located on public transportation and a stop for the JHU shuttle. Check out our new student lounge.
Information.DrivingDirections: From downtown, take Charles Street north. Cross over University Parkway to 3900 North Charles Street on the left.

Information.ShortDescription: Live artfully at The Fitzgerald Apartments-a community of Baltimore apartments for rent with brand new studio, one and two-bedroom rentals located in Mount Vernon, Baltimore. Inspired by F. Scott Fitzgerald and the energy of his era, our residences are meant to move, inspire and stimulate. Complete with stunning features, exotic community amenities and breathtaking details, The Fitzgerald apartments are located just blocks away from The University of Baltimore, MICA, The Lyric and The Meyerhoff.
Information.LongDescription:
You'll never run out of exciting ways to have fun at The Fitzgerald. Rest your body by the stunning outdoor pool or work it at the state-of-the-art fitness center. Hang out in one of our luscious lounges or outside in the courtyard. Our exotic luxury amenities will impress and entertain both you and your guests, making boredom go buh-bye.
Whether it's a studio, one- or two-bedroom apartment, each residence is sophisticated, elegant and modern, yet comfortable-stocked with the most sought-after, stylish features. Granite countertops, high ceilings, enormous windows-the details work together harmoniously to create the perfect framework for a unique, modern and tasteful living space.
Information.DrivingDirections: From I-83 S Take exit 5 for Maryland Ave. Merge onto Oliver Street and turn right on Mt. Royal Ave.

Information.ShortDescription: The Paramount, in Crystal City, offers spectacular space and breathtaking views of DC and the Potomac River. Crystal City offers easy access to Washington, DC, Reagan National Airport and major interstates. Take an evening stroll to your favorite restaurant or sports bar, work out in our private gym or play a friendly game of racquetball. All of these conveniences right at your fingertips! In addition, you'll enjoy our award-winning Bozzuto Management resident services to make you feel at home!
Information.LongDescription: The Paramount is the only residence to turn high-rise apartments into a high-caliber, boutique-style way of life. From your enormous interior space or private balcony, you'll enjoy breathtaking views of downtown DC - and inside, the ambiance is equally impressive. Beyond the entirely desireable Arlington location and the luxury features, finishes and amenities, our residents enjoy a degree of personal attention worthy of boutique hotels. In every way, The Paramount offers an inspiring alternative to everyday apartment living.
Information.DrivingDirections:
From DC: Take the 14th St. bridge to Rt. 1 South exit. Take 1st R off ramp onto 15th St. At 1st light take a R onto S. Eads St. The The Paramount is the first R.
From 395 South: Take the Crystal City exit (Rt. 1). Turn L on Army Navy Dr. Continue through 1st light and make a R onto S. Eads St. We are located on the corner of S. Eads St. and 15th St.

Please visit www.thetuscanyapts.com for more information on our exquisite apartment community. Or call (703) 212-6959 to schedule a personal tour today!

Information.LongDescription: Embrace luxury at Bank Street Commons. This luxury high-rise community offers an incomparable atmosphere. We offer well designed 1 and 2 bedroom apartment homes featuring washers and dryers in every apartment, spacious closets and designer kitchens with breakfast bars. There is an array of amenities including a 24-hour, fully-equipped fitness center, an indoor swimming pool, BBQ grills in our courtyard areas, a beautiful clubroom and a guest suite for visitors. Our residents also enjoy concierge services. We are only a short walk to downtown White Plains and its array of fine dining, shopping, and entertainment options. We are also only a two-minute walk from the White Plains train station. Bank Street Commons...right in the middle of it all!
Information.LeaseLength: 12-18 month lease terms currently available. Please contact us about possible short term leases.
Information.DrivingDirections: Bank Street Commons is located at the corner of Bank Street and Main Street in White Plains, right next to the train station. Our main entrance is on Bank Street. Our address is 15 Bank Street, White Plains, NY.

A simple name for the all new fusion of shopping, dining, offices and residences located on Washington Circle in the multicultural heart of this world city. Experience the enjoyment of on-site retail and dining that includes Whole Foods, Citibank, Roti Mediterranean Grill, Sweetgreen and Circa at Foggy Bottom. Experience the convenience of the Metro just across the street. Experience the joy of watching the sun set from a rooftop vantage point. And experience the pleasure of walking to nearby shopping, dining, cultural events and recreation. There are no other NW Washington, DC apartments like these. Experience life along The Avenue.

Information.ShortDescription: At The Monterey you will find a place where contemporary elegance is a way of life. From the inviting lobby to the most luxurious finishes available in any apartments in North Bethesda, you're surrounded by the home you've always desired.
Information.LongDescription:
When you enter The Monterey will you find a place where contemporary elegance is a way of life. From the inviting lobby to the most luxurious finishes available in any apartments in North Bethesda, you're surrounded by the home you've always desired. And if the abundant features and expansive space aren't enough to win you over, the value at which it's all available surely will.
The Monterey has been unstinting in providing residents with a dazzling variety of ways to spend their free time. Move to these White Flint Metro apartments for amenities that include everything from a well-connected Wi-Fi cafe to a health club featuring state-of-the-art cardio and weight equipment, a Pilates studio for stretching and strengthening, and an outdoor entertainment lounge complete with fire pits and a winebar. Beyond that, there's The Monterey Apartments' ideal location: in the heart of North Bethesda's superior shopping, dining and entertainment, and just steps from two Metro stations.
Information.DrivingDirections:
From I-495 Westbound/MD: Take I-495 West to Exit 34 (Rockville Pike/MD-355) toward Rockville/Bethesda. Turn left on Montrose Road. Cross over Old Georgetown Road. The property is on the right at the corner of Old Georgetown Rd and Montrose Rd.
From I-495 Northbound/VA: Take I-495 North to Exit 38 (I-270 North) towards Rockville/Frederick. Take Exit 4A (Montrose Road). Stay on Montrose Road. The property is on the left at the corner of Old Georgetown Road and Montrose Road.

Information.ShortDescription: MODELS NOW OPEN! Brand New Premiere Luxury Apartments available for IMMEDIATE occupancy. The Arbors is close to numerous popular retailers, restaurants and entertainment centers, just minutes from the Avenue at White Marsh and White Marsh Mall.
Information.LongDescription:
Brand New Premiere Luxury Apartments. The Arbors at Baltimore Crossroads is located between White Marsh and the Baltimore County waterfront, along the newly extended MD Route 43. We offer upscale apartment homes in a vibrant live, work, play community. The Arbors is close to numerous popular retailers, restaurants and entertainment centers, just minutes from the White Marsh Town Center and 2 miles to Interstate 95. The community is 12 miles from downtown Baltimore just 23 miles to BWI Airport. It also offers easy access to transit, just 1 mile to the MARC train station and 7 miles to the Amtrak.
Enjoy luxury apartment features including cherry cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a washer and dryer in every home. Amenities include a resort-style saltwater pool with cabanas, state-of-the-art fitness center with personal TV's, business center, theatre lounge, game room social events, and even a year-round AstroTurf dog
Information.LeaseLength: 12, 14 and 16 month leases. Short term corporate leases may be available.
Information.DrivingDirections: From I-95, take exit 67A, Route 43, towards Middle River. Proceed two miles to entrance on right.

Information.ShortDescription: The Apartments at McHenry Row offer unmatched access, charm and convenience with exceptional amenities and creative living spaces. Every apartment home offers first-rate finishes including ENERGY STAR stainless steel appliances, washer and dryer, 10' exposed metal ceilings, designer tile, 42" maple cabinets and granite counter tops. Lofts, balconies, spacious and distinctive floor plans are yours for the choosing with a plan to suit every lifestyle.
Information.LongDescription: This exceptional pet-friendly living environment offers controlled access entry, plentiful garage parking with EV car charging stations, Zipcars, bike storage, valet trash service, concierge services and award-winning management. To further enhance your living experience there are unique amenity spaces to socialize, educate and enhance your mind, body and spirit. Take in the harbor views from the rooftop terrace. Gather with friends in the media room, game room, demonstration kitchen or wine lounge. Relax and get fit in the wellness center and fully-equipped athletic club. Surf the web or get to work in the business center or cyber cafe. Listen to live music in the outdoor plaza under the iconic water tower. No community offers you more to do in one place in a walkable neighborhood with world-class parks, museums, and transportation.
Information.DrivingDirections: From 95 take exit 55 and follow signs for Key Highway. Follow Key Highway to the first stop light and turn right onto McHenry Row. Make first right onto Whetsone Way and follow signs for McHenry Row Leasing.

Information.LongDescription: JOIN US FOR AN OPEN HOUSE FEB 18-20th WITH GREAT SPECIALS, CUPCAKES, AND CHAMPAGNE! Overlooking Halstead Square's neighborhood of restaurants and retail at the Dunn Loring Metro is a new, luxury apartment community that turns living into an art form. Introducing The Rockwell. High-tech meets the height of style with studio, one- and two-bedroom units loaded with the highest quality features and finishes. With built-in iPod dock systems with in-wall speakers, Brazilian granite countertops, custom designed movable islands, and Italian porcelain tile, there's an eye-opening discovery around every corner. Catch the big game on the big screen in the Halstead Club. Unwind by the Oasis Terrace's resort-style pool. Or, challenge your skills at virtual golf. When it comes to community amenities, Halstead Square is without equal. Walk to Dunn Loring Metro. Zipcar Car Sharing Program w/ Car Onsite. Electric Car Charging Station. *BlackFinn and Lost Dog Cafe Opening Summer 2012*
